short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transliterate Telugu text to Hindi using Unicode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transliteration is the process of converting text from one script or writing system into another script. It involves representing the sounds and characters of one language using the characters of another language while maintaining the pronunciation as closely as possible. This extension also converts the old ancient numbers in the source language to the target language.
